title: Chapter 1: The Role Reversal
summary: Aarav is disappointed when he learns Anaya has a bigger role in the school play, leading to feelings of jealousy and insecurity.

title: Chapter 2: The Green-Eyed Monster
summary: Aarav struggles to deal with his jealousy towards Anaya, but with the help of his friends and Grandpa Dev, he learns to acknowledge and manage his emotions.

title: Chapter 3: The Big Audition
summary: Aarav faces his fears and auditions for a solo part in the school play, leading to a rollercoaster of emotions as he waits for the results.

title: Chapter 4: The Waiting Game
summary: Aarav learns the importance of patience and resilience as he waits anxiously to hear back about the audition results.

title: Chapter 5: The Unexpected Twist
summary: Aarav is surprised by the outcome of the auditions, leading to a mix of emotions including happiness, disappointment, and confusion.

title: Chapter 6: The Power of Positivity
summary: Aarav learns about the impact of positive thinking and gratitude as he navigates through his emotions and reactions to the unexpected twist.

title: Chapter 7: The Friendship Test
summary: Aarav's friendship with Anaya is put to the test as they both deal with their own emotions and insecurities surrounding the school play.

title: Chapter 8: The Heart-to-Heart
summary: Aarav and Anaya have a heart-to-heart conversation, where they both open up about their feelings and fears, strengthening their bond and understanding of each other.

title: Chapter 9: The Wisdom of Grandpa Dev
summary: Grandpa Dev shares his wisdom and experiences with Aarav, teaching him valuable lessons about emotional intelligence and self-awareness.

title: Chapter 10: The Final Rehearsal
summary: Aarav faces his final rehearsal for the school play, where he must put his newfound emotional skills to the test in order to deliver a stellar performance.

title: Chapter 11: The Big Night
summary: Aarav experiences a mix of nerves, excitement, and pride as he takes the stage for the school play, showcasing his growth in handling his emotions.

title: Chapter 12: The Aftermath
summary: Aarav reflects on his journey of self-discovery and emotional growth throughout the school play, realizing the importance of embracing and expressing his big feelings.
